sqls.sql: SELECT unode, wks_seq, wks_name, wks_no, wks_desc1, wks_desc2, wks_worker_num_c, wks_worker_wkt_c, wks_unit_price, wks_is_enable, backto_wks_seq, wks_is_test, wks_is_begin, wks_is_end, pd_rmb_wks_rmk01, pd_rmb_wks_rmk02, pd_rmb_wks_rmk03, pd_rmb_wks_rmk04, pd_rmb_wks_rmk05, pd_rmb_wks_rmk06, pd_rmb_wks_rmk07, pd_rmb_wks_rmk08, pd_rmb_wks_rmk09, pd_rmb_wks_rmk10, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user_no, upd_user, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM mo_rmb_wks WHERE rmb_wks_id = @rmb_wks_id;
